title: AE/PR/PS/OFX/达芬奇影视后期特效插件 Digital Film Tools Tiffen Dfx v4.0v8
author: 大众脸
content: 一款拥有完整独立界面的特效插件，拥有超过2000种的滤镜特效效果，例如：玻璃过滤器，特殊镜头，专业光效，胶片颗粒，色彩校正，抠像……插件能轻松的在软件中调入使用，能模拟调节出很多电影质感的效果。Simulating 2,000+ popular award-winning Tiffen glass filters, specialized lenses, optical lab processes, film grain, exacting color correction, plus natural light and photographic effects, the Tiffen Dfx digital filter suite is the definitive set of digital optical filters for professional photographers, top motion picture filmmakers, video editors, and visual effects artists around the world.
supported_versions: Adobe After Effects CS5 – CC2015；Adobe Premiere Pro CS5 – CC2015；Adobe Photoshop CS5 – CC2015；Assimilate Scratch v8或更高版本；Black Magic Resolve v11或更高版本【达芬奇】；Sony Vegas v13或更高版本；The Foundry’s Nuke v8或更高版本；其他支持OFX插件的软件

download_links.name: AE/PR/PS/OFX/达芬奇影视后期特效插件 Digital Film Tools Tiffen Dfx v4.0v8
